name: Visualization Technology Decision
description: Maps each visualization in the DESIGN-RESEARCH to a minimum technology tier and produces VIZ-TECH-DECISIONS.md. Ensures no data-encoding visualization defaults to CSS-only rendering.

all_of.description: Technology tier assignment for each planned visualization

validations.description: At least one visualization must be assigned Tier 1 or higher

notes: This gate bridges design research (G4) and content production (G5). The technology decisions here constrain what the producing agent may implement. Any data-encoding visualization assigned to Tier 0 is a contract violation. See orchestration/standards/visualization-quality-standard.md for the full technology ladder and subject-to-technology mapping.
